title: Vie : Fullstack Invoicing Web App
description: Vie is a fullstack web app, built from the ground up with Nextjs, MongoDb, Auth0, Tailwindcss, ChartJs and Framer Motion. You can create/edit/search/delete customers and invoices.Invoices can be previewed exported as a pdf. The dashboard gives insights with data visualisation based on your invoices.

title: Jazzroom Records : Fullstack Ecommerce Site
description: Full Stack e-Commerce web app for a small record label. I used Next.js for frontend. Strapi/ Node for backend and cms. Magic link is handling Auth. And Stripe handles payments. The backend is deployed with Heroku/Postgres and frontend with Vercel. AWS S3 handles image uploads.

title: My Gatsby Portfolio
description: My last portfolio/blog built using gatsby/react, graphql and sass. I made this website to showcase some of my work, write about cool things to do with coding. This portfolio has been superseded because I love Next.js!

title: Journalist Portfolio Website
description: I created a portfolio website for a graduate Journalist / content writer. Utilising Gatsby.js, ContentfulCMS, GraphQL and Netlify. The React based Gatsby framework produces super-fast, reliable and feature rich websites.
